item.title: Follow us on Twitter
item.description: Be sure to follow us on Twitter with great brand updates, promotions and news about all things RTC or IVR. Our hand is @ivrpowers and our favorite hashtags right now are #RTC and #IVR. Give us a shout out! https://twitter.com/ivrpowers

item.title: Follow us on Facebook
item.description: Do not forget to follow us on Facebook. You can contact us and stay updated on all thatâ€™s going on at IVRPowers and on the latest news about RTC or IVR. Join us and stay tuned for new information at https://www.facebook.com/ivrpowers/
